p: High purity (>97%) of DEET and the EOCs, geraniol, eugenol, carvacrol, thymol, citronellic acid, linalool, menthone, trans-cinnamaldehyde, α-pinene, β-pinene, and limonene were obtained from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA). The chemicals were diluted to 1% in acetone (99.7% purity; Fisher Scientific, Fair Lawn, NJ, USA).
